title: The Rogue Alphas Series
description: Kindle Vella Edition!!Read Episode by EpisodeTo Be Included:Book One: Bound to YouBook Two: Surrender to YouBook Three: Possessed by YouBook Four: Burn for YouBook Five: Rescued by YouFive strange bikers with a secret...The women they love...All bound by fate...Steamy, shifter romances that include age-gap romance, enemies to lovers, & friends to lovers tropes with a ton of suspense and secrets in-between.
author: E.M. Rizzuto
